entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing after midnight. Snow level 1600 metres. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
